author: hansbak
msg: show number of days between timestamps and add a day to a timestamp. I realize this is perhaps not the best method, but it works. If somebody has suggestions to do it better, pleae let me now, i will change it....

author: jacopoc
msg: Implemented new wrapper service and refactored the quick return creation to use it: in this way the creation of the return header and the creation of the items and adjustments are all in the same atomic transaction. No header is created if the creation of the items/adjustments fails.

author: dumindu
msg: Fixed a few probable win32 build issues in the previous commit.

author: dfabulich
msg: [SUREFIRE-398] Skipped tests don't call testStarting.  Assume startTime = endTime if startTime is 0.
